attributes.action: add Rottweilers to the Dangerous Dogs Act
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am absolutely fed up of reading about children being killed by Rottweilers. 
As well as numerous injuries inflicted on other dogs by this dispicable breed. Also they are owned by people who cant handle them and dont castrate them which just adds to their violent tendencies.
